description:
Course Description

Learn key concepts and skills that you will need to build proficiency in Microsoft Excel so you will be prepared to get a job, secure a promotion or just be a better entrepreneur.

Build a strong foundation in Excel (which is proven to be an important job and business skill) with this tutorial specifically designed for beginners. Learn about:

  • Entering and Editing Data Fast;
  • Selecting Ranges Wisely;
  • Using Key Formatting Tools Efficiently;
  • Inserting Charts and Sparklines Quickly;
  • Solving A Common Business Assignment Effectively;
  • And Much More

A Powerful Skill at Your Fingertips Learning the fundamentals of Excel puts a powerful and very useful job securing tool at your fingertips. Excel is easy to learn and is essential to many jobs in this knowledge-based economy.

Knowing how to use Excel can be a key factor in determining whether you get a job or secure a promotion. You can learn Excel and I make it easy for your by giving you job relevant skills and using real world scenarios to keep it interesting for you.

Content and Overview Designed specifically for beginners who want a to get right to the important material. Through this course you'll learn some of the fundamentals and establish a strong understanding of the how to work smart in Microsoft Excel.

Starting with identifying the elements on a worksheet, this course will take you through some basic Excel Skills like inserting columns and entering data quickly to completing a real world business assignment using Excel. By working with these lessons, you'll a establish a strong understanding of the basics of Excel.

Students completing the course will have the knowledge to create and manipulate a basic Excel spreadsheet quickly and with ease.

It is important that you work alongside the author as you work through each concept as this will give you the confidence and knowledge to move on to the next level.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Learn some of the fundamentals of Microsoft Excel 2016.
  • Short videos that each deal with only a few concepts to make it easy to digest.
  • Suitable for beginners in Excel and ideal for users who learn faster when shown.
  • Visual training method, offering users increased retention and accelerated learning.
  • Real World assignment to increase retention in adult students.
title: Excel 2016 - Top Beginners Guide - Start Now
